overview: A famous mommy blogger faces an empty nest as her daughter prepares to go away to college. When she turns to her blog for advice, she finds herself on the attack by a reader who has conflicting opinions. While she deals with him online, offline she finally meets a great single dad and sparks start to fly. What she doesnâ€™t know is that the confrontational reader and the adorable single dad are, in fact, the same person.
title: Hearts of Spring
